short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ColorizeLex is a browser extension designed to enhance the readability of English articles by visually distinguishing speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ColorizeLex is a browser extension designed to enhance the readability of English articles by visually distinguishing part of speech.
